### Load packages and data


```{r load-data, message=FALSE}

```

## Exercises

### Exercise 1

```{r glimpse}
glimpse(nobel)
```
There are 935 rows and 26 columns. The rows represent nobel laureates.

### Exercise 2

```{r noble_living}
nobel_living <- nobel %>%
  filter(is.na(country) == FALSE,
         gender != "org",
         is.na(died_date))

```
